alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 07 at 8:16AM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin and the White River Basin from Steadman Mesa east of Rangely west to the Utah border. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Freezing temperatures will likely lead to ice accretion on sidewalks and road surfaces resulting in slick conditions for drivers and pedestrians.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
